subtitle: vẹ-hu perush yafeh u-menupeh ʻal Shulhạn ʻarukh Orah ̣hạyim asher hịber Yosef Kạro ... ʻim hịdushe dinim she-hishmit ̣ha-gaʾon ... vẹ-himtsiʾam ... Mosheh Iserlish
edition_name: 880-04 Hotsaʾah hạdashah, menukẹdet u-mefusekẹt uve-fiʻnuah ̣rashe-tevot uve-hagahah medukḍekẹt.
title: Sefer Mishnah berurah
by_statement: kol eleh hịbarti [i.e. compiled and edited] Yiśraʾel Meʾir b.R. Aryeh Zeʾev ha-Kohen
full_title: Sefer Mishnah berurah vẹ-hu perush yafeh u-menupeh ʻal Shulhạn ʻarukh Orah ̣hạyim asher hịber Yosef Kạro ... ʻim hịdushe dinim she-hishmit ̣ha-gaʾon ... vẹ-himtsiʾam ... Mosheh Iserlish

notes.value:
Title on cover, <v. 2>: Sefer Mishnah berurah ha-menukạd.

Includes text of Shulhạn ʻarukh, Orah ̣hạyim.

Includes Beʾer ha-Golah by Mosheh Ravkạsh, Baʾer hetẹv by Judah ben Simon Ashkenazi, Shaʻare teshuvah by Hạyim Mordekhai Margaliyot.
